full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GCOD YUL GDAN THOG GCIG GDAMS PA ZAB BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,(CES ZAB LAM GCOD KYI ZHAL GDAMS, RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I NANG NAS GO SLA LA KHYER BDE BA'I MAN NGAG CUNG ZAD BSDUS SHING, 'THOR BA GO RIM DU SDEBS PA DANG, LAS DANG PO PA RNAMS KYI GNAS GZHAN DUR KHROD SOGS SLA NYAMS SU LEN PA'I RIM PA DANG BSTUN PA'I ZUR 'DEBS SU GYI NA BA YUL SKYID SMAR CHAR SKYES PA'I DGE SLONG BYAMS PA'I MING CAN GYIS ZHOGS DPAL RI'I BOR SBYAR BA'O, RGYAS PA NI RNAM BSHAD CHEN PO @031B SPYI KHRID NYAMS KHRID, ZHAL GSUM BSTAN PA, GNAS THEBS SU BSTAN PA, ZAB DON THUGS KYI SNYING PO, RIN CHEN PHRENG BA RJE'I GCOD GZHUNG SOGS LAS SHES DGOS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,ZHUS DAG ,)
